text: Cuthbert "Chris" Barrass (11 February 1898 – 13 October 1978) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1898 births Category:1978 deaths Category:People from South Shields Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Pandon Temperance F.C. players Category:Jarrow F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Chris Barrass
